doc.previous: At the 2011 census Manitoba had a population of 1 208 268 more than half of which is in the Winnipeg Capital Region Winnipeg is Canada s eighth largest Census Metropolitan Area with a population of 730 018 2011 Census 60 Although initial colonization of the province revolved mostly around homesteading the last century has seen a shift towards urbanization Manitoba is the only Canadian province with over fifty five percent of its population located in a single city 61
